en: sound of a jigger that explodes

ngiemboon: À sẅě kúkwò tà á gӱo le tẅag.
en: He killed the quid until he made that “tẅag”.

ngiemboon: A ně ńtó na twɛ̂b lêtsẅɛ́ʼ, ḿbúʼte ncwò ndá.
en: He came at midnight and knocked on the door.

ngiemboon: À ne ńdɔgɔ tÿèen ńcÿo menzsǒ.
en: He is ironing his clothes with the iron.
